					[1601] cell "Product Description Pankoo Monocular Telescopes 40x60 High Power Prism Monocular monoculars If you want to look your idol but can't see clearly in a concert; If you like watching birds but afraid of suffering them; If you want to prepare a gift to your family or friends but have no idea to choose; Pankoo monocular can meet all the inconveniences above. monicular See the instruction manual for details about connection method of Phone And Monocular . Product Quick Look ????【HD MAGNIFICATION】10X magnification and 60mm object lens diameter monocular, provides a clearly, bright image and different fields of view, Perfect for Hiking, Hunting, Climbing, Bird watching, Ball games, Concerts, traveling, Watching Scenery. ????【HIGH CONTRAST AND RESOLUTION IMAGES】The Monocular telescope equipped with the B A K 4 prism and fully muti-coated lens, The larger the objective lens, the more light that enters to the monocular, and the brighter the image. Clear image without black bars,it makes Super Clear and Sharp Images. ????【WATERPROOF & FOG PROOF】Compact and sturdy body make it withstand the heavy weather, the mirror is full of the high-purity nitrogen, waterproof and antifogging. You can use it in raining day and humid environment, and no need to worry about this item. ????【Monocular Widely Compatible With Smartphone】Comes with quick alignment smartphone holder, tripods, Compatible with smartphone, Easy to install, remote control monocular, provide HD images to share with your friends.e with smartphone ✌【100% satisfaction hours customer service】if you are not 100% satisfied with our product, no-questions asked, we offer a 30-day money back . take action, buy now! ! !"

								StaticText '????【WATERPROOF & FOG PROOF】Compact and sturdy body make it withstand the heavy weather, the mirror is full of the high-purity nitrogen, waterproof and antifogging. You can use it in raining day and humid environment, and no need to worry about this item.'

									[1891] cell 'Pankoo'
					[1892] cell "Product Description Nightfox Logo The Nightfox Vulpes Find Your Range Crystal Clear Footage Night Vision Innovation Dark night, clear vision Product Quick Look MORE POWERFUL THAN EVER: Nightfox's flagship unit is the Nightfox Vulpes, a pair of handheld night vision binoculars with a fixed 6x optical magnification and an adjustable 3x digital zoom. With a massive 220 yards of range in the darkness, the Vulpes is an ideal addition to your hunting gear or spy gear setup. Unlike a traditional night vision scope, The Vulpes works both in daylight and at night. INTEGRATED LASER RANGEFINDER: Thanks to an integrated Laser Rangefinder showing a real-time distance measurement on the screen, the Vulpes is the ultimate piece of tactical gear. Determine the exact distance of your target - up to 200 yards in optimal conditions - with a click of the button. The live measurement not only displays on the LCD screen but also shows on your captured video recordings. This unique feature makes the Vulpes the ideal pair of binoculars for hunting. CRYSTAL CLEAR FOOTAGE: The Vulpes boasts a Full High Definition (FHD) infrared camera sensor: 1920*1080p resolution. The night vision camera technology found inside the Vulpes means you'll get excellent quality video footage, all saved onto the included 32GB memory card and easily downloadable to your Mac or PC. AUDIO RECORDING: Thanks to an integrated microphone, video footage taken by the Vulpes also includes audio recording - A real innovation for digital night vision goggles like the Vulpes. Capture your complete night vision experience like never before. ENERGY ALL NIGHT: Two integrated rechargeable batteries totalling 6400mAh capacity give over 6 hours of constant use. With the included micro USB cable, simply plug the Vulpes into any USB port to charge, like a wall socket or a USB power bank. Never be stranded with a flat night vision scope again. If you need a pair of hunting binoculars to keep going all night, the Vulpes won't let you down."

step_data.thought: I'm already on the product comparison page which is showing a detailed comparison between two similar items: the Pankoo 40X60 Monocular Telescope ($74.99) and the Nightfox Vulpes Handheld Digital Night Vision Goggles ($399.00). The page displays all relevant information including images, ratings, pricing, and detailed specifications for both products. I can see the key differences in features, capabilities, and price points. The Pankoo is a more affordable standard monocular while the Nightfox is a premium night vision device with advanced features like video recording and a laser rangefinder. The comparison is complete and all information needed to compare these similar items is displayed.
step_data.action: stop('I can see the comparison between two similar optical viewing devices: The Pankoo 40X60 Monocular Telescope ($74.99) and the Nightfox Vulpes Night Vision Goggles ($399.00). The Pankoo is a standard monocular with 10x magnification and basic features, while the Nightfox is a premium night vision device with 6x optical magnification, video recording capability, and an integrated laser rangefinder. The Nightfox has a higher rating (100% vs 80%) but costs significantly more ($399 vs $74.99). Both are designed for activities like bird watching, hunting, and outdoor viewing.')
